channel.title: Login Messages
channel.description:
Hey. Im using a 317 Delta server and whilst ive been looking through some of the development sections, i have seen servers with login messages with admin crowns next to it. I was wondering if you can do this on a 317 or if its just 508+? I'd be grateful if anyone could help please Smiley I've been told that this is client sided so i posted here :)
Thanks, Rares

item.title: Login Messages
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

no problem =)
most credit to rich though, i just looked and gave you what you needed.

Read full topic

Thanksssssssss,

item.title: Login Messages
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

umm this might work but idk

find in ur client class(client side)

				anInt1175 = 0;
				anInt1134 = 0;
				anInt986 = 0;
				anInt1288 = 0;
				anInt924 = 0;
				anInt1188 = 0;
				anInt1155 = 0;
				anInt1226 = 0;
				anInt941 = 0;
				anInt1260 = 0;

under the last anInt
and above

method79(1)

add

send("Message here..............................", "@cr2@Name");

heres the void.

	public void send(String s, String n) {
		method77(s, 2, n, false);
	}

Declare it in the client class to.

hope it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Login Messages
item.dc:creator: @RarerThanRares RarerThanRares
item.description:
@RarerThanRares wrote:

client.java:9442: cannot find symbol symbol : variable p location: class client p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<shad=1><trans=100><col=ffffff>Welcome to RarePk"); ^ client.java:9442: package p does not exist p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<shad=1><trans=100><col=ffffff>Welcome to RarePk"); ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Got these two errors… Can someone help?

Read full topic

item.title: Login Messages
item.dc:creator: @d0nt_v3ng d0nt v3ng
item.description:
@d0nt_v3ng wrote:

Add this next to the message it is a simple shade if you think its interesting:

p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<shad=1><trans=100><col=ffffff>Welcome to SERVER NAME HERE");

This works with 317’s aswell as 508s.

Read full topic
